channel.title: [317] Item.java and equiping help [317]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, thanks in advance for reading my post. On my server there are many items that I still need to put into the item.java categories. I managed to get most done, but for any chest armor I tried to do this with the black shirt of my character comes through. As seen in the picture I will have uploaded below. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/344e7sy.png[/img]
And also, for the helms that I am trying to put in, I have tried putting their codes in each of the different helm slots I have in my item.java (helm, full helm, full mask) and they still take over the weapon slot.
If anyone can help I'd greatly appreciate it!

item.title: [317] Item.java and equiping help [317]
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Thanks! I’m running on 3 hours of sleep for the past two days and it’s starting to catch up with me! I can’t believe I didn’t try that already!

Problem solved.

Read full topic
